name: Secret Santa Application
description: A highly customizable secret santa app

TITLE.description: The title of your Application, this will be displayed on the pages that your users will see

GMAIL_USER.description: The gmail email that you will be sending your picks through

GMAIL_FRIENDLY_NAME.description: The name of the inbox you are sending the email from

ADMIN_PASS.description: The password that you will use to run the picking algorithm
